title: 1 Bed 1 Bath Apartment Home With A Nest Thermostat & Keyless Access!
posting_body: ['Biltmore', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '10159 South Blaney Avenue Cupertino, CA 95014', 'Plan 1E  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 747 Sq.', 'Ft / From $3,516', '* Unit 106 - Available 08/26/22', '* Unit 205 - Available 09/02/22', 'A refreshed perspective on apartment living—the Biltmore is modern luxury and space to breathe in Cupertino.', 'If you’re after a one-bedroom, one-bathroom home in a great location, Biltmore Apartments is the go-to neighborhood.', 'Meal preparation will be a breeze as the open kitchen has GE appliances and spacious European-style cabinetry, and tile or granite countertops are available depending on your preferences.', 'Best of all, your next home has a spacious den that you can use as an extra bedroom or a study area.', 'Start your life at Biltmore soon and grab the opportunity to lease one of the new apartments with floor-to-ceiling windows, quartz countertops, and Nest thermostats.', 'The neighborhood also offers wide-ranging amenities, including a gym, a pool, and a fireside lounge.', 'Biltmore is located in Cupertino, and only minutes from California 85, so traveling around the area will be extra convenient.', 'Learn more about current pricing and availability.', 'They are subject to change, so call today!', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '* Club House', '* Fitness Center', '* Playground', '* Onsite Maintenance', '* Night Patrol', '* Smoke Free', '* Laundry in unit', '* Onsite Management', '* Package Receiving Locker', '* Recycling', '* Pool', '* Sundeck', '* Assigned Parking', '* Spa', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'Pets are allowed.', 'We welcome up to 3 pets per household with a $200 per pet deposit and $65 per pet monthly pet rent.', 'Cats and dogs are welcomed without weight restrictions though certain breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more details on our pet policy.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to
